item.description:
Google and Bing use social media signals as ranking factors. So - do you have an integrated strategy to optimize both your SEO and social media? Join SEMPO Boston for “Integrating Social Media and SEO: 1 + 1 = 5."

Eric Enge, CEO of Stone Temple Consulting, co-author of The Art of SEO, and noted industry speaker, will be sharing insights with you on how to carry out effective marketing campaigns by marrying social media and SEO.

Register to Attend here at http://www.sempo.org/...)

When: 6PM to 8PM on March 5, 2012

Where: Constant Contact - Reservoir Place - 1601 Trapelo Road - Waltham, MA

During this presentation, you’ll learn: - Why SEO and social media satisfy new consumer search habits - How search engines adapt to incorporate social media - Ways to optimize your campaigns for both SEO and social media Naturally, the event will include great networking opportunities so you will have a chance to mingle with other local marketing professionals.

Also, please keep in mind that search professionals from all over the world pay thousands of dollars to hear from recognized experts like Eric Enge. Fortunately for us, Eric has graciously accepted our offer to speak at SEMPO Boston’s next event, which creates a unique learning opportunity for search experts throughout Massachusetts. This event will sell out, so we recommend you register now, and we ask that you tell your friends! Register here: http://www.sempo.org/...

The SEMPO Boston Working Group
item.name: SEMPO Boston March Event: "Integrating Social Media and SEO: 1+1=5"
